title: Claude Opus 4.6 Launch
description: Anthropic launched Claude Opus 4.6 as their most capable model with agent teams feature in research preview, enabling multiple agents to work in parallel as a team. Major update bringing enhanced collaborative capabilities to Claude Code.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code 2.1.0 Just Changed Everything, And Most Developers Haven't Noticed Yet

title: GPT-5.3-Codex Release
description: OpenAI introduced GPT-5.3-Codex as the most powerful, interactive, and productive Codex model to date. Available across all Codex surfaces including app, CLI, and IDE extension.

title: Codex Desktop App for macOS
description: New Codex desktop app released for macOS as a command center for managing multiple coding agents in parallel. Features multi-agent parallel processing with native, open-source, configurable system-level sandboxing.

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Support
description: Added support for Claude Opus 4.6 with limited-time promotional pricing: 2x credits for 'no thinking' mode and 3x credits for 'with thinking' mode. Available in Arena Mode's Frontier Arena and Hybrid Arena.

title: Agent-Driven Workflows in VS Code v1.109
description: January 2026 release brought agent-driven workflows to GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code, along with significant improvements to the Copilot experience including better tool calls and chat improvements.

community_feedback.quote: Discussion about slow start-stop cycles affecting Copilot Agent workflow in GitHub webapp

title: Visual Studio January Update
description: January update for GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio introduced colorized code completions, partial acceptance of code completions, and productivity improvements.

title: Agent Loop Feature
description: OpenAI unveiled Codex CLI's 'agent loop' for enhanced software automation, detailing user-model interactions and software change orchestration.

title: Model Retirement and Updates
description: GPT-4o and other legacy models were retired on January 29, 2026. Users advised to update CLI to see GPT-5.3-Codex model capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: Some users reported changes in progress log granularity after recent updates

title: Wave 14: Arena Mode
description: Windsurf released Arena Mode, bringing side-by-side model comparison directly to the IDE. Users can run two Cascade agents simultaneously with hidden model identities and vote on performance. Also introduced Plan Mode with a 'megaplan' advanced form for asking clarifying questions.

community_feedback.quote: Windsurf推出Arena Mode: 一個prompt, 兩個模型, 同場競技
Benchmarks don't reflect real-world coding quality. The best model depends on your actual use cases.

title: v0.27.0 Release
description: Released on February 3, 2026 with event-driven architecture for improved performance and responsiveness. Features cleaner UI with removed input prompt box border.

title: v0.26.0 Update
description: Released on January 26, 2026 with Agent Skills feature for extending Gemini CLI functionality and new hooks capability.
